content: lion brand pattern # 50057 corrections applied skill level easy level 2 lion® suede article #210 *discontinued* 3 colors 122 yards each crochet hook - size i-9 gauge 13 single_crochet = 4 inches \ 10 cm first 7 rnds = 4 inches \ 10 cm across special stitches decrease single_crochet decrease fpsc front post single_crochet cap is worked in rounds of alternating colors visor is worked in row visor has 2 layers inner and outer *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
